thread.title: Cathy J. Winterbotham
thread.title_full: Truecar reviewed by Cathy J. Winterbotham

author: Cathy J. Winterbotham
title: Cathy J. Winterbotham
text: Please take your time get on the internet and use True Car to help you get the best deal you can. I got my Honda Civic LX Sedan for 1250.00 under invoice, never thought I could do that. Shopped at five different dealerships to get the best deal, pitted one dealership against another. It worked they all wanted/said they could beat/give you the best deal. I made a very low ball offer at first and one dealership admitted to me No one would even come back with an offer at that price. It seems I was 1500.00 under invoice but, that was a great piece of information and I did come up. I still purchased under invoice, my brother's were amazed, so proud of me. Use True Car to your advantage they are a great source and according to their statistics, I did great. Thank you True Car, couldn't have done it without you.
